death-of-a-loved-one.title: Death of a loved one
death-of-a-loved-one.summary: If you have lost a loved one, you may qualify for help, including assistance with burial or funeral costs, financial support, and more.
death-of-a-loved-one.secondaryHeadline: Federal Benefits After Losing a Loved One
death-of-a-loved-one.eligibilityCriteria: We are sorry for your loss. Answer the options below to find possible Federal benefits to help you navigate this difficult time.
About the military service of the person who died
